UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Vipericidins: a novel family of cathelicidin-related peptides from the venom gland of South American pit vipers.
Literature.Author: Rádis-Baptista G, Andreu D, Barron AE, Pérez-Peinado C, de la Torre BG, Falcao CB

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=6.25 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=64µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=16µg/ml)
